name: Push for Progress
text: Chiaki Asami deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. Max twice per round. Flip 1 your policy cards to its Pending side, then ready it. You may spend 1 resource. Flip 1 of your policy cards to its Enacted side (2 if you spent a resource this way).

name: On Borrowed Time
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced At the end of your turn: Take X damage, where X is the number of actions you spent this round. If another investigator is at your location, take 1 direct horror. Discard On Borrowed Time.

name: Family Bonds
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Max twice per round. Jack Myer Deck only.

Family Bonds does not count towards your maximum hand size.
Move a non-weakness card in your hand up to 2 positions to the left or right. Draw a card. Shuffle this card into your deck.

name: Prying Eyes
text: While Prying Eyes is in your hand: You can only play the 2 leftmost cards in your hand. (Prying Eyes cannot be discarded.) Forced At the end of your turn: move Prying Eyes one position to the left.

flavor:
"Why did you become a gangster?"
"Because you can do in a single day..."
name: Burning Ambition
text: Akira Hojo deck only. Fast. Uses (0 supplies). [reaction] After you succeed a test by 3 or more while using Akira Hojo's [reaction] ability, place 1 supply on Burning Ambition. Forced When there are at least 3 supplies on Burning Ambition: Search your bonded cards for Rite of Passage and swap it with Burning Ambition.

flavor: "...What it takes an ordinary man thirty years to do."
name: Rite of Passage
text: Bonded (Burning Ambition). This card cannot leave play. You get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you succeed a skill test by 3 or more, exhaust Rite of Passage: Play an event card from your hand (paying its cost).

name: Occupational Hazard
text: Revelation Put Occupational Hazard into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn take 1 damage. If an ally is defeated this way, take 1 horror and discard Occupational Hazard.

flavor: "While the city quietly left us to die, she kept us going. We will do our part to end this damnation.
name: Vagrant Messenger
text:
Limit 1 per investigator. Alma Venandi deck only.

Enemies at your location have -1 evade.
[free] Exhaust Vagrant Messenger and deal 1 damage to it: Move to Alma Venandi's location.

flavor: "It's happening again. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry."
name: Inevitable Fate
text: Revelation Place Inevitable Fate into play in your threat area. It costs investigators an additional action to leave your location. [action] Discard an Ally asset controlled by Alma Venandi: Discard Inevitable Fate. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

name: Lives Lessons
text:
William Grindel's deck only. Fast. Play when an investigator reveals a chaos token that would make them fail a skill test on an scenario card.
Cancel all revealed chaos tokens and reveal a new chaos token. The performing investigator may set their base skill value equal to your [willpower] value for the remainder of this test.

name: Cosmic Animosity
text: Revelation Put Cosmic Animosity into play in your threat area. The first non-weakness treachery card you draw each round gains surge. [reaction] After you fail a skill test on a scenario card: Discard Cosmic Animosity.

name: A Sight to See
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover a clue at a connecting location. Forced When A Sight to See would be discarded: Set it aside, out of play, instead.

name: Photo Album
text:
Elise Collnis deck only. Uses (2 secrets).

[reaction] After you succeed the test on a copy of A Sight to See, place 1 secret on Photo Album.

[free] Spend 2 secrets and exhaust Photo Album: Shuffle 1 event from your discard into your deck.

name: A World Of Solitude
text: Revelation Put this card into play in your threat area and place 3 resources on it. You cannot play events. [free] Discard a copy of A sight to See, then remove 1 resource from this card. Forced At the end of your turn discard 1 resource on A World Of Solitude, then take 1 horror. If there are no resources on A World Of Solitude, discard it.

name: "Drinks on me!"
text: Amelia Barrett deck only. For the remainder of the round, healing from player card effects may be disturbed among investigators and/or Ally assets at their location. Heal 2 damage and 2 horror. You may take 1 horror, then draw 1 card.

name: Alone in the World
text: Revelation For each Spirit event in your hand, either take 1 horror or discard it. Then, if you have no Spirit events in hand, discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Draw each weaknesses discarded this way.

name: Policy
text: Permanent. Chiaki Asami deck only. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location, exhaust this card: Another investigator discovers that many clues at their location instead. [free] During your turn, if you played a Insight event this round, exhaust this card: Take an Investigate action.

name: Policy
text: Permanent. Chiaki Asami deck only. [reaction] When an investigator at your location would play an Insight or Favor card, exhaust this card: It gains fast. [free] During your turn, exhaust this card: Draw 1 card.

name: Policy
text:
Permanent. Chiaki Asami deck only.
[reaction] When you play an event, exhaust this card: Another investigator at your location gains resources equal to half the cost of the event (minimum 1, rounded up).

[free] During your turn, exhaust this card: Reduce the cost of the next card you play this turn by 1.

name: House Rules
text: Armen Seropian's deck only. Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, either gain 3 resources or discover 1 additional clue at this location (if you succeed by 3 or more, do both).

name: Cheating Accusations
text: Revelation Discard 4 resources. Draw 1 card. If you have at least 10 resources remaining in your resource pool and there are at least 5 cards remaining in your deck, shuffle Cheating Accusations into your deck.

name: Marked for Death
text:
John Wick deck only.

Fast. Choose an enemy at your location. Attach Marked for Death to it and engage it. 
You get +2 skill value during tests while fighting the attached enemy.

[reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Heal 1 damage and horror (2 if the enemy had at least 4 printed health).

name: Abandoned by God
text: Revelation Put Abandoned by God into play in your threat area. Cards in your play area and discard pile lose the Firearm and Weapon traits. [action] [action]: Discard Abandoned by God. Reduce this ability's action cost by 1 if John Wick was healed this round.

name: Out of Sight
text: John Smith deck only. Permanent. Uses (1 fragment). [reaction] After you resolve an encounter card: Place 1 fragment on Out of Sight. [free] Spend 2 fragments and exhaust Out of Sight: Shuffle one of you set-aside [REDACTED] cards into the top 8 cards of the encounter deck. Forced When a [REDACTED] card you own would be discarded from anywhere: Set it aside, out of play, instead.

name: Fading Existence
text: Hunter. Surge. You may place a non-weakness, non-Elite enemy at any location on the bottom of the encounter deck and spawn Fading Existence at that location. Otherwise, discard Fading Existence. When Fading Existence would be discarded: John Smith discovers 1 clue at John Smith's location.

name: Without a Trace
text: Surge. Revelation Choose and resolve up to 2 of the following, in any order: - Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an Elite enemy. - Heal 1 damage or 1 horror. - Move to John Smith's Location.

name: Existential Overload
text: Revelation Put Existential Overload into play in your threat area, with 5 rifts on it. If there is no rifts on Existential Overload discard it. Forced When an investigator would draw an encounter card due to surge, you draw it instead. Remove 1 rift from this card.

name: The Best of Times
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

If this test is successful, the owner of this card draws 1 card or they move to Old Man Johnson's locations.

name: The Worst of Times
text: Revelation Put The Worst of Times into play in your threat area. Forced After you commit a card to a skill test, it loses 1 matching icon and all effects. Forced After you succeed a skill test, if you commited at least 2 skills, discard The Worst of Times. Otherwise take 1 horror and shuffle The Worst of Times into your deck.
